titleStmt.title: A proclamation for re-establishing the staple-port at Camphire.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the 30th day of March, and of Our Reign the tenth year, 1699.
With a list of staple commodities below imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
